name: Heritage Auckland

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in this hotel for one night and it was a pleasant hotel. The staff were friendly, the room was a good size and clean. The location is not great as it is was in a grungy area and there weren't a lot of cafes around the place for breakfast the next morning. If I was to stay there again I will include breakfast in the room price.
reviews.title: Just OK

reviews.text: This hotel ended our holiday in New Zealand and we had 3 nights there. Unfortunately it was a very bad end to an otherwise good accommodation experience throughout both North and South Islands.
reviews.title: Whatever you do don't stay here. Appalling service from start to finish

reviews.text: To start when we arrived at 3.45 in the afternoon we were told that only 1 room was ready. There was no apology for this or explanation and we were also told that one of the rooms had a really good view as it was higher and the other one didn't. This was obviously a real disappointment and we asked why we couldn't have both with a good view but were told there were no more rooms. We booked both rooms at the same time about 3 weeks before so it was hard to believe.
reviews.title: Good location and big rooms

reviews.text: The Location is pretty good although they didn't explain that it has 2 entrances on completely different streets which would have been helpful as when our friend came to meet us she went to the other entrance!
reviews.title: Very convenient, reasonably priced option in Auckland, especially if you have a motor home with you!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When we got back about 5.30pm to collect the other key the girl on the desk said she had to go and see a supervisor and disappeared for about 10 minutes. Again no explanation of why or apology?
reviews.title: Gambling in Auckland

reviews.text: This is a good business hotel or a convenient base for exploring CBD area. There is nothing exciting about the decoration or facility, but it is a good comfortable and clean hotel that provides a lot services either business traveler or leisure traveler desires ( such as coin laundry facility in hotel wing, or full kitchen and laundry in tower wing rooms). The hotel staffs are nice and helpful. There are numerous eateries, convenience stores and coffee houses nearby. It has a very good location, easily accessible by both airbus and linkbus.
reviews.title: convenient hotel for CBD

reviews.text: I would definitely recommend this hotel. Just don’t expect it to be a “unique” hotel experience.
reviews.title: Tired and dated

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here on business for 2 nights, which was probably 2 nights too much. There was nothing terribly bad about it just an extremely bland and boring hotel with dated furniture and decor and absolutely nothing to it at all. Bed was average, room was depressingly small and dated, I had utterly depressing views over the inside of the hotel - i.e. other rooms and a room. The tiny balcony faced out over this - god only knows why !
reviews.title: Ideal central city hotel withcharacter

likes.liked: — Very nice tastefully furnished and fitted room, great location.
likes.disliked: — Internal sign posting a bit confusing.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff were friendly enough and the inroom meal was excellent.
reviews.title: A very good choice for staying in the CBD
Not bad, but better available
reviews.text: Good location also.

I love this hotel and stay here often. I prefer the tower part of the hotel which has great views over the harbour. The rooftop swimming pool is really great, best in Auckland. The staff are always helpful especially Sacha and also the room service crew.
reviews.title: you will like it here
Nice Hotel
reviews.text: Nice hotel love the TOWER side best have stayed a few times and always request the towerside :) love the pool and spas great if you have kids and foods great!

I spent 3 nights here. It is walking distance to any thing in the CBD and also the twin rooms are large and have a division in them so you sort of have you own room when sharing, very good for sharing with friends. To top off staff were all very friendly.
reviews.title: great option in Auckland

reviews.text: This was a good value hotel close to central city, We initally got a room that was plesant but without a view, a quick call to the front desk resulted in a much better room with views of the Harbour Bridge. This is a good hotel as a base and close to the Casino as well.
reviews.title: Central and Value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Loved it, huge room, spotlessly clean, speedy and friendly check-in and checkout, great location, taxi rank outside, couldn't fault except for little view from room. Would recommend.
reviews.title: Great value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I recently spent three nights at this hotel. With the exception of taking a bus to the Auckland War Memorial Museum (we returned on foot), we walked everywhere we wanted to go including the harbor, restaurants, shopping areas, National Maritime Museum, Sky City, etc. The room was comfortable, clean and spacious. It had a mini-bar (didn't use) and supplies for making coffee, tea and hot chocolate. Our room overlooked the courtyard dining area. There were sitting areas outside the elevators on each floor. Breakfasts were fabulous and included just about anything you could possibly desire for your morning meal. The staff was friendly and courteous. We did not use the pool or fitness center but both appered very nice.
reviews.title: Loved the Heritage!

reviews.text: The location was perfect! You could walk to the marina where there are tons of restaurants, pubs, shops, and the Sky Tower. The hotel was an excellent price and it was very nice and comfortable. The staff was very nice, they have a great roof top pool, and tennis courts. Our rooms even had fabulous views of the harbor! I would definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: Great central location!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Spent our wedding night here. Based our choice on the fantastic reputation it has and it didnt disappoint. Was a brilliant place to end our special day.
reviews.title: Lives up to its reputation

reviews.text: Great modern spacious room and bathroom. Excellent room service.
reviews.title: Bedroom contained a washer/dryer unit

reviews.text: Will definitely come back here - for our 25th anniversary!
reviews.title: Awesome time

description: Art deco; historic landmark refurbished in 1998.
